TopicTitle: kerbal doing the training to rescue - Guard cost style !

Articles.Content:
after strugling without luck with mods in a try to extend the physics range ( droping from my plane a submarine / boat to do the propper rescue) i decided to do something i a small scale in a try to continue with the idea of rescue my kerbals splashed down or simply crashed 

 

it was a 10/10 mission and  they went to the base to rest for today
